unit: Unit 4 | Probability, Random Variables, and Probability Distributions
title: Playing Solitaire and Winning on the Fourth Game
question_text:
Maria loves to play Solitaire on her computer and knows that the probability that she will win is $65\%$.
Assuming every game she plays is independent, what is the probability that the next time she sits down to play Solitaire, she will win for the first time on her $4^\text{th}$ play of the game?
